First of all the uploader is fucking stupid, no nfo or info so fuck off :)
and this game works perfect :)
heres is a guide to install it,
1 - Download alcohol 120% and install it
2 - Open alcohol and in left side press on Virtuel Drive under properties
3 - a new window opens and then you adding 1 drive and pressing ok
4 - in alcohol rightclick on the virtuel drive in the lowest ´window and press mount image
5 - open the image file and install
6 - Play and enjoy (but remember dont unmount image file after installing) :D
